EXODUS

Exodus

An exciting adventure that takes you through twists and turns at every chapter!

This piece of fiction tells the story of a rogue commander of a special forces unit betraying her own to meet her own objective. The unit seeks her out to get their revenge. However, things are not cut and dry as they seem.

Book

Hardback Finish. Limited Edition.
